ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] How are people getting the white scales?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can still bring Phinny to zone.  You send a camoed druid to his lair, hit him with a DOT then COH the druid to zoen.  Phinny and/or his sidekicks will show
ygData.messageBody:
You can still bring Phinny to zone. You send a camoed druid to his lair,
hit him with a DOT then COH the druid to zoen. Phinny and/or his sidekicks
will show up one by one for very easy pickings. We did it with:
54 druid
60 mage
56 wiz
58 war
55 bard
56? cleric

I wasn't complaining about my guild/leaders with the thumb up my butt
comment. We tried Gone recently and we just don't have the resists to do
her. I think people in our guild got lazy since we whomping other dragons
(Trak, Wuoshi, Serv, Talendor) and never got good resist equipment. We have
been working on it for a couple of weeks now and I think we'll make another
run at Gone soon.

Elfson Allegro 55 Veeshan
